backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that handles contact form submissions, user profile storage, and access-controlled queries using AccessControl, MixinAuthorization, and MixinStorage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (language switcher fix, VoiceReader component, etc.) to their affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short prose summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key features of every page and component in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.) applied via @layer base.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Agro Crops Vite/React app, mounting the React root div and loading the main.tsx module entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app file that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes, CartContext/CartProvider for shopping cart state, LanguageProvider wrapping the full tree, and an AuthLayout that conditionally renders the VoiceReader on authenticated pages.
Reusable wrapper component that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger CSS animation classes (fadeIn, slideUp, zoomIn, etc.) when the section scrolls into view.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying brand info, translated quick-navigation links, and real contact details (email, phone, location) with clickable mailto/tel links and a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with navigation links, a slide-out shopping cart sheet with checkout flow (cart → details → success), mobile menu, and language switcher.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Renders a pill-style toggle button group for switching between English, Hindi, and Marathi using the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/components/VoiceReader.tsx: Floating text-to-speech widget that reads visible page content aloud using the Web Speech API, supporting play/pause/stop and the active language.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Thin re-export file that exposes the useCart hook and CartItem type from App.tsx for convenience.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context provider that manages the active language (en/hi/mr), persists it to localStorage, and exposes a translation helper t().
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) via React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login/logout state and persisting the identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting a contact form (useMutation) and fetching all contacts (useQuery) via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind with eco-themed CSS custom properties for colors, and defines reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with a hero section, animated stats, mission/vision cards, and a team grid displaying member contact info using the LanguageContext for translations.
frontend/src/pages/Cattle.tsx: Displays detailed livestock care guides for various animals (cow, buffalo, goat, poultry, sheep, etc.) including breeds, feed, health, housing, productivity, and market value information.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Provides a contact form that validates input, submits to Formspree for email delivery, and optionally persists the message to the ICP backend actor, with success/error state handling.
frontend/src/pages/CropSuggestions.tsx: Presents region-specific crop recommendations with detailed info (sowing season, soil type, yield, water needs, organic tips, pests) organized by Indian state/region.
frontend/src/pages/Equipment.tsx: Lists farm equipment items across categories (tillage, seeding, harvesting, etc.) with specs, usage details, and embedded YouTube tutorial links, supporting search and category filtering.
frontend/src/pages/Farm.tsx: Displays a searchable crop guide with 22 crops, each showing season, soil type, benefits, and farming tips. Uses language context for i18n and AnimatedSection for scroll animations.
frontend/src/pages/GovernmentSchemes.tsx: Renders detailed cards for Indian government agricultural schemes (PM-KISAN, PMFBY, KCC, NMSA, etc.) including benefits, eligibility, and official apply links.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero banner, organic farming benefits grid, region-wise crop highlights, and government scheme previews with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/OtpVerification.tsx: Four-digit OTP verification page that validates against hardcoded '1234', sets session authentication on success, and supports resend functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: E-commerce shop page with a large product catalog (seeds, fertilizers, tools, etc.) supporting search, category filtering, cart addition, and wishlist via toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Mobile number sign-up page that validates a 10-digit number, stores it in sessionStorage, and navigates to the OTP verification page.
frontend/src/pages/Techniques.tsx: React page displaying organic farming techniques (composting, pest control, crop rotation, etc.) with expandable cards showing steps, benefits, tools, and pro tips. Uses language context and animated sections.
frontend/src/utils/translations.ts: Defines TypeScript translation strings for English, Hindi, and Marathi across all app pages including nav, shop, cattle, equipment, schemes, and contact sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence helpers for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom eco/green colors, Nunito/Montserrat fonts, card shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations (fadeIn, slideUp, zoomIn, etc.).
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 51) describing the Agro Crops organic farming website architecture, existing features, known issues (cart, auth redirect, contact form, language switcher), and design/animation guidelines.
